channel.title: [PI] Drop Rate [PI]
channel.description: Alright so I want to know exactly how the NPCDrops.Tsm file works. I know most of you will probably tell me to use the search bar, but I have looked and nothing is clear or concise. So any help would be appreciated.

it depends on how many items there are the more u have the rarer the item u put last is

item.title: [PI] Drop Rate [PI]
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

The program reads the file to gather input, the uses the numbers to set drop rate, item ids and amounts along with the monster the drop corresponds toâ€¦

If you want to know EXACTLY how it works, open up NPCDrops.java and read the loadDrops method.

Read full topic
